title: Bobby on How To Help Tornado Relief + Bobby’s Addresses Conspiracy Theories About Him Online + A Listener Has A Theory About Amy’s Recent Events
itunes:title: Bobby on How To Help Tornado Relief + Bobby’s Addresses Conspiracy Theories About Him Online + A Listener Has A Theory About Amy’s Recent Events
description:
Bobby talks about the tornadoes that hit over the weekend…and just in Kentucky, the hardest hit of six states. Bobby addresses a whole list of conspiracy theories that have been circulating about him online. A listener shared a theory about Amy running into “rude people” a lot recently and questions whether it’s everyone else or her to blame.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
